page.title: 06THE MILKMAN
page.content: Bert is a school milkman.He delivers to 630 customers every day except Sunday.He has been a milkman for 20 years.He gets up at 4,30a.m. every day,goes to the dairy,loads up his milk float with 750 bottles of milk and other items such as eggs,pop and potatoes.His float is powered by batteries which have to be charged every day. He collects his money on Friday nights and sometimes has trouble catchimng people for their money.Bert does not think there will be any milkmen in 3 years time because supermarkets sell milk cheaper. We think this is a pity because they save people's lives every day simply by noticing any unusual signs, especially with old people.
